description:
Put a (durable) lid on it. A fusion of foam cushions your head from falling objects, with improved side and back coverage that meet the proposed UIAA helmet requirements. A hardtop shell in the upper and front area protect from punctures and add durability in higher wear areas. The whole package weighs next to nothing, so you don't have an excuse to not protect your noggin.

  • Made of expanded polypropylene and expanded polystyrene, which has a high rate of energy absorption
  • Partial ABS shell adds impact protection and durability in key areas
  • Comfort pads are removable for washing
  • Adjusts for a custom fit
  • 2 hooks and rear elastic for attaching a headlamp
name: Black Diamond Vision Helmet - Unisex
